newsitem.title: USA: RESEARCH ALERT - Trenwick, Zurich Re.
newsitem.headline: RESEARCH ALERT - Trenwick, Zurich Re.

text.p: -- Morgan Stanley said it downgraded Trenwick Group Inc and Zurich Reinsurance Centre Holdings Inc to neutral from outperform.
-- Trenwick closed at 52-1/4 Tuesday and Zurich ended at 31-1/4.
